text: COVRA (Centrale Organisatie Voor Radioactief Afval) is the Dutch nuclear waste processing and storage company in Vlissingen,COVRA website which stores the waste produced in the Borssele nuclear power plant after it is reprocessed by Areva NCAREVA NC - nuclear energy, nuclear fuel - La Hague in La Hague, Manche, Normandy, France. Until the Dutch government decides what to do with the waste, it will stay at COVRA. COVRA currently has a license to operate for one hundred years. The director is Jan Boelen. title: COVRA
